name: Doomsday Escape
description:
Can You Escape - Deluxe - Out Now!

This is a post-apocalyptic world. There are not many people left alive and you’re one of them. You have to look around, move all the time to find those who may still need your help, and search for food. After the last searching mission you've got lost, and to find other survivors you have to escape this trap as soon as possible. Will you find out where to go? Is there any chance of finding other survivors?
